original_text: Israel has done a bad thing. They have not obeyed the command of the covenant that I made with them. That have taken for themselves some of the valuable things that belong to me. They have taken them and they have tried to deceive me. They have hidden them among their own things.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 범죄하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 나의 언약을 어겼으며 또한 그들이 온전히 바친 물건을 가져가고 도둑질하며 속이고 그것을 그들의 물건들 가운데에 두었느니라

sentences.original_text: Israel has done a bad thing
They have not obeyed the command of the covenant
They have taken for themselves some of the valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들을 위해 귀중한 것들 중 일부를 취했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they have tried to deceive me
They have hidden them among their own things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 자기들의 물건들 속에 숨겼습니다
